Actions.Name: Add an image watermark to a PDF
Actions.Description: Add an image watermark to each page of a PDF document

Actions.Name: Add a password to a PDF
Actions.Description: Protect a PDF document with a password. Encrypt the PDF document to prevent unauthorized access. https://www.pdfblocks.com/docs/power-automate/add-password-to-pdf

Actions.Name: Add restrictions to a PDF
Actions.Description: Add restrictions to prevent copying, printing, and modifying a PDF document. https://www.pdfblocks.com/docs/power-automate/add-restrictions-to-pdf

Actions.Name: Add a text watermark to a PDF
Actions.Description: Add a text watermark to a PDF document. Choose from many watermark templates in https://www.pdfblocks.com/docs/power-automate/add-watermark

Actions.Name: Extract pages from a PDF
Actions.Description: Extract one or more pages from a PDF document. https://www.pdfblocks.com/docs/power-automate/extract-pages-from-pdf

Actions.Name: Merge PDF documents
Actions.Description: Combine multiple PDF documents into a single PDF document. https://www.pdfblocks.com/docs/power-automate/merge-pdf-documents

Actions.Name: Remove pages from a PDF
Actions.Description: Remove one or more pages from a PDF document. https://www.pdfblocks.com/docs/power-automate/remove-pages-from-pdf

Actions.Name: Remove the password from a PDF
Actions.Description: Remove the password from an encrypted PDF document. The PDF document will no longer require a password to open. https://www.pdfblocks.com/docs/power-automate/remove-password-from-pdf

Actions.Name: Remove restrictions from a PDF
Actions.Description: Remove all the restrictions from a PDF document. https://www.pdfblocks.com/docs/power-automate/remove-restrictions-from-pdf

Actions.Name: Remove signatures from a PDF
Actions.Description: Remove all the signatures from a PDF document. https://www.pdfblocks.com/docs/power-automate/remove-signatures-from-pdf

Actions.Name: Reverse the pages of a PDF
Actions.Description: Reverse the order of the pages of a PDF document. https://www.pdfblocks.com/docs/power-automate/reverse-pages-of-pdf

Actions.Name: Rotate pages in a PDF
Actions.Description: Rotate one or more pages in a PDF document. https://www.pdfblocks.com/docs/power-automate/rotate-pages-in-pdf
